text: siriyawa thula alkayida ka්riyakalapaya, asadta sahaya dakwana atharathura rusiyawa ha iranaya karana anathuru angawim, palamuwa thamange siyalu wibhawa sathuranta erehiwa purna parimanaye pa්raharayak ella nokota ewan yuddhayakata elambaimata pentaganaya adimadi kirima, eja yuda tharjana kerehi palawana gambauru mahajana apa්rasadaya hethukotagena eksath janapadaye widesha pa්rathipaththi sansthapithaya thula purna parimana yuddhayaka nuwanakkarakama pilibandawa nagi ena mathabheda hamuwe, obama palanadhikaraya awasana mehothe yuddhayen adiya passata gaththeya.

aya pawasanniya.lama sangananayaksampurna sakachchawe handa pataya obe durakathanaye ho pariganakaye meya wadanaya kirimata adala mrudukanga natha lama shramikayan pilibandawa da shri lankawe saba thathwaya soya baliya yuthu bawayi amathiwariya bibisiyata kiya sitiye.shri lankawe lamun pilibandawa siyalu thorathuru helidaraw kara ganima sandaha jathika lama sangananayak pawathwimata katayuthu salasum kara athi bawath in laba ganna daththayan adhyayanaya kirimen lamunta aarakshawa sapayima karyakshama kala haki bawath aya thawaduratath kiya sitiyaya.daruwo dahathara dahak‘ada me daruwan muhuna pana pasubima apa soya baliya yuthuyi.

aththata api nohithuwata api wagema thawa minissu ki denekuta me wage aspat dewal karala jiwithaya gata gaha gannata wela ath da?monawa koranna da meka aasiyawe aascharya ne.maha lokuwata diyunuma rata kiyala pennanna inna hitinna thanak nathi minissu trak wala patawan gihin thawa ahakata dala udin pallen nagara sanwardhanaya koranawa.wenna oone me wage prashna gana awadhanaya yomu karala mala apaduwya bahara karanna mita wada hoda kramawedayak hadunwa dena ekayi.ada diyunu lokaye ratak udaharaneta gaththothin me wage prathichakriya kramawedayak hoya ganna eka amaru wenne na.arabi ratawala mala drawya prathichakriyakaranaya karala paniya jalaya pawa nishpadanaya karana withthiya ape saho la dannawa athine.mewwa gana thawa katha karanna giyoth mage politikal limts okkoma paninawa.monawa unath saho me wage thiththa aththa gana podiyata hari katha karapu eka hugariyak watina deyak.mara sahota - wibhage hodata goda da ganna ful trayi eka denna oona.obata jaya!
